original_text: I, Daniel, had much trouble in my mind. The things that I saw in my vision frightened me. I, Daniel, had much trouble in my mind. The things that I saw in my vision frightened me.
korean_text: 나 다니엘이 중심에 근심하며 내 머리 속의 환상이 나를 번민하게 한지라

sentences.original_text: I, Daniel, had much trouble in my mind
sentences.korean_translation: 나 다니엘은 마음속에 많은 어려움이 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: The things that I saw in my vision
